    • Method Detail

      • getMemByCpu

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getMemByCpu(java.lang.Integer numCpus,
                                                            com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<CapabilityMapper.InstanceType> instanceTypes)
        Gets a List of memory size which correspond with numCpus.
        The memory integers are pulled from every CapabilityMapper.InstanceType , from the instanceTypes ImmutableList, that also has numCpus as cpu value.
        Parameters:
        numCpus - the numCpus to find the corresponding memory values for
        instanceTypes - the instance types to search in
        Returns:
        a List of valid memory values that correspond with numCpus

      • getCpuByMem

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getCpuByMem(java.lang.Integer memSize,
                                                            com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<CapabilityMapper.InstanceType> instanceTypes)
        Gets a List of numbers of cpus which correspond with memSize.
        The numbers of cpu integers are pulled from every CapabilityMapper.InstanceType , from the instanceTypes ImmutableList, that also has memSize as memory value.
        Parameters:
        memSize - the memSize to find the corresponding number of cpus for
        instanceTypes - the instance types to search in
        Returns:
        a List of numCpu values that correspond with memSize

      • getInstanceType

        public static java.lang.String getInstanceType(java.lang.Integer numCpus,
                                               java.lang.Integer memSize,
                                               com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<CapabilityMapper.InstanceType> instanceTypes)
        Gets the String representation of an CapabilityMapper.InstanceType that has both numCpus and memSize as values.
        Parameters:
        numCpus - the number of cpus the CapabilityMapper.InstanceType should have
        memSize - the memory size the CapabilityMapper.InstanceType should have
        instanceTypes - the ImmutableList to choose from
        Returns:
        the string representation of an CapabilityMapper.InstanceType or "" if none was found

      • checkValue

        public static java.lang.Integer checkValue(java.lang.Integer value,
                                           java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> checker)
                                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Checks if the value is in the List checker, if not take the next bigger value. If there is none throw an IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to check
        checker - the List to check in
        Returns:
        a valid value of the checker list
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the value is too big
